quote: Adonai, your creations are your reflections, and they show us that you are amazing. Thank you for even the stars up above, that those that look upon them may enjoy their majesty and splendor.
quote_letters: ADONAI YOUR CREATIONS ARE YOUR REFLECTIONS AND THEY SHOW US THAT YOU ARE AMAZING THANK YOU FOR EVEN THE STARS UP ABOVE THAT THOSE THAT LOOK UPON THEM MAY ENJOY THEIR MAJESTY AND SPLENDOR
